item.title: How To Create A Visible Black Smokey Eye On Hooded Eyes
item.description: If you’ve got hooded eyes, a black smokey eye can disappear the moment you relax your lid and suddenly look like plain eyeliner. In this tutorial, I’m showing you exactly how I map a new crease above the hood to double the visible lid space and keep the smokey effect bold and lifted. These small placement tweaks make all the difference, and once you see it, you’ll never do a hooded-eye smokey the same way again.

item.title: 20 Years Of Concealer Secrets In One Trick
item.description:
If you’ve ever struggled with under eye hollows, dark circles, or concealer creasing, this one’s for you. I’ve spent over two decades working with makeup on mature skin, and trust me, I’ve made every mistake so you don’t have to.
In this tutorial, I’m showing you my tried-and-true under eye formula that smooths fine lines, avoids cakiness, and actually lasts all day, plus the common mistakes that make under eyes look worse. One side done the right way, one side done the wrong way, so you can see the difference clearly and decide what really works for your skin.

item.title: Make your eyeshadow pop with this simple trick
item.description: Take your eyeshadow from flat to fabulous! This easy trick makes colors appear brighter, more vibrant, and long-lasting, no complicated steps, just maximum impact with minimal effort.
